content: Are you scared of insects mah~? When I was a kid, they'd freak me out. But after all those insect-hunting adventures with my Gran'mama in the fields, I got used to it.

content: {A疑惑}But every time I'd try to swing for a bug with my net, I wouldn't always catch an insect...

content: Well mah, we can make bugs into fertilizer too! Catching them is a breeze, but some are more useful alive than dead.

content: You can mix up leftover food, weeds, and paper waste to feed to little earthworms. They'll wiggle around and make earthworm fertilizer. {A叹气}But keeping them alive is challenging!
